ygData.subject: Hehehehehehehe......
ygData.msgSnippet: Off in a deserted part of China, a strange thing happened.  It was silent and bright.  And just when it seemed nothing would ever happen there until future

    Off in a deserted part of China, a strange thing happened.  It was sile=
nt and bright.  And just when it seemed nothing would ever happen there unt=
il future Earth, something did happen.  Out of nowhere, a big blue portal a=
ppeared.  Then, the portal warped in a strange alien building!  The buildin=
g resembled a pyramid sort of, with a strange blue crystal at the top.  At =
each corner, there were long pole-like things sticking up.  Then, several o=
ther smaller blue portals appeared, and each one warped in.....Alien creatu=
res!  But alien creatures didn't seem like the right word(s) for these.....=
People.  Yes, a people.  Not a human people, but an extra-terrestrial peopl=
e.  Two of them were wearing some bandana-thing over their mouths, and each=
 had a sort of cape on.  And, strangely, these peeps were permanently cloak=
ed(invisible).  They had strange blades too.  

        Two of the other wa=
rriors, well, they looked like warriors anyway, wore strange-but-cool armou=
r, and on their back-hands they had little gadgets which, when activated, e=
mitted little blades made out of a blue lazer material.  

        The next=
 two people that arrived were also strange.  They wore strange armour, but =
it wasn't combat armour.  You couldn't see their faces, all you could see w=
as blackness and then two red, glowing dots, their eyes.  They looked like =
magic-users, or priests or something that represented mysticism, religion o=
r sorcery.

        Finally, the last two....people....were warped in.  The=
se didn't look like the others!  They looked more mechanical than biologica=
l.  The had four legs, two at each end, robotic legs.  At the top they had =
robotic armour and shit.  

        But, it wasn't the end of the warping! =
 Two, much larger, blue portals appeared....In the sky!  Then, emerged two =
big ships(I won't powergame).  Hehe, if you looked at them, they almost res=
embled bumbe-bees.  But then again, not really.  The two ships flew out of =
the warping portal, then they hovered high in the air, casting an immense s=
hadow over the building and the people.  They stayed there.  

        "Ah,=
 Zeratul, we've arrived at a strange planet indeed.....Why, it reminds me o=
f Tarsonis, but, it seems.....different," said one of the cloaked dudes to =
the other one.

        "Yes, Toranis, it does resemble the Terran Raynor's=
 homeworld quite closely...." Zeratul said.

        "My brethren!" shouted=
 one of the dudes with lazer blades, "This must be the UED homeworld, Earth=
!!!"

        "Why, I believe you're correct, Allanon!  But it seems.....Un=
inhabited," Zeratul replied.

        The two mage-looking guys, who's name=
s were Anthradar and Azlis, spoke up.

        "This world isn't uninhabite=
d.....I feel a presence on this planet....But it's definitely not Terran or=
 Human," Azlis said.

        "My brother is correct," Anthradar added.

  =
      "Well, then we should explore this planet," Toranis suggested.

     =
   The other dude with lazer blades, named Amostitus, nodded, and said, "Pe=
rhaps, we should send the Carriers to scout...."

        "That would be a =
good idea....." Zeratul said.

        And so they did send the Carriers.  =
The Carriers were the two large ships.  The names of the ships were the Gan=
trathor III and the Slasidor...

OOC: Hehe, anybody own this game and know =
what I'm talking about?

        



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~LurkerA=
byss~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper Of Souls~
~The Shadow Of Th=
e Dark~
~I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
